about_the_game:
Cute Fames Adventure, An 2.5D RPG Adventure! Set in a town with no name.. But, In this adventure. Your main focus is to help the protagonist turn back into what he originally was!, Instead of this cutesy dog-like form.

The main importance lies in the cast. And their mission is to turn back into humans! The 2 boys have changed into some cute-looking dogs! But this was never how they originally looked. So you are tasked with battling away through environments, And freeing them out of this form! They also demonstrate their true strength.



The gameplay utilizes turn-based combat, integrating itself with the story, And utilizing it to progress the game in more ways. The gameplay is RPG-focused, having you take on quests, defeat enemies, and level up by just fighting like any other game, But battles, And actively seeking battles. Levels up your player to gain new skills, Such as, "Tail Whip," "Taunt", And a "Dance" skill. Which will need to be timed for usage!
-Combat features an on-screen turn counter so you will always know who will attack when
-Free Roam sections always try making the player search around areas more for any hidden items or places that help explain the Current Location.



  • • Mod Support X Controller Support/Rumble Support
  • • Boss Rush
  • • Achievements + Steam Achievements
  • • 3D and 2D Gameplay Combined!
  • • 4+ Hours of content
  • • Voice Acting
  • • Accessibility Options
detailed_description:
Cute Fames Adventure, An 2.5D RPG Adventure! Set in a town with no name.. But, In this adventure. Your main focus is to help the protagonist turn back into what he originally was!, Instead of this cutesy dog-like form.

The main importance lies in the cast. And their mission is to turn back into humans! The 2 boys have changed into some cute-looking dogs! But this was never how they originally looked. So you are tasked with battling away through environments, And freeing them out of this form! They also demonstrate their true strength.



The gameplay utilizes turn-based combat, integrating itself with the story, And utilizing it to progress the game in more ways. The gameplay is RPG-focused, having you take on quests, defeat enemies, and level up by just fighting like any other game, But battles, And actively seeking battles. Levels up your player to gain new skills, Such as, "Tail Whip," "Taunt", And a "Dance" skill. Which will need to be timed for usage!
-Combat features an on-screen turn counter so you will always know who will attack when
-Free Roam sections always try making the player search around areas more for any hidden items or places that help explain the Current Location.



  • • Mod Support X Controller Support/Rumble Support
  • • Boss Rush
  • • Achievements + Steam Achievements
  • • 3D and 2D Gameplay Combined!
  • • 4+ Hours of content
  • • Voice Acting
  • • Accessibility Options

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: R9 270X
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Alternative Requirements: Intel i7-3820, GTX 950 (OpenGl 4.0+)
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Arch Linux
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 2200G
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RX 580
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Alternative Requirements: Intel i5-7400, GTX 1080 TI (OpenGl 4.0+)

  • Processor: Intel Only
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:

  • Processor: Intel Only
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM

short_description: Cute Fames Adventure, Is a Turn Based - RPG, Where you turn back into a human! Utilizing two protagonists to fight, Run and discover new areas! With the game's story, The main goal is to find a way to return to normal.
